turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The tracking information hasn't updated, and I'm starting to get worried.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello. I understand your concern. Can I get your tracking number, please?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 98765432101234567890. I'm really frustrated because it contains medication I need, and I'm running low.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. One moment while I check on this for you... Okay, it seems the package is currently at a distribution center about 50 miles from your address. There's a delay due to weather conditions, which is affecting many deliveries in your area.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Weather? But the weather has been fine. And why isn't the tracking updated? That's a pretty crucial detail for me to know, and it's the first thing I checked.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the lack of tracking updates. Sometimes, there can be a lag in the system. Regarding the weather, there was a brief period of heavy rain at the distribution center, which caused the delay. I understand your need for the medication. The package is expected to be delivered by end of day tomorrow. I will be able to provide you with an update then.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I guess I'll have to wait. Thanks for the information. I will check back tomorrow then.
